featured.text: After retirement, Mr. Wang _____ ice skating, which he had always loved but had not had time for. (A) appealed to (B) took to (C) related to (D) saw to 15.

definition.zh_def: 退休，指停止工作或職業生涯，通常因年齡或工作年限而選擇的生活階段。
definition.en_def: The act of leaving one's job and ceasing to work, typically due to reaching a certain age or after a long period of employment.
definition.example: After many years of hard work, she looked forward to her retirement and traveling the world.
